data.actual_result: It's always in English, regardless of your settings.
data.expected_result: It should show in the language you selected in the user settings
data.short_description: Everyone description is always in English, regardless of your client settings
data.steps_to_repro: - Change your language on your client to a language with approved strings of "Notify everyone who has permission to view this channel." - Go to a channel where you have permissions to ping atEveryone - Observe the description
